security_compliance.title: Security & Compliance
items: No LLM training on customer data

items.question: Where is my data stored?
items.answer: All data is stored in secure, enterprise-grade data centres. We offer EU hosting options for GDPR compliance.

items.question: How quickly can I launch?
items.answer: Most clients launch within 48 hours. Upload your content, customise branding, and you're live.

items.question: Do you support multiple languages?
items.answer: Yes, OpenHouse AI supports 50+ languages out of the box, with automatic translation capabilities.

items.question: Can I white-label the assistant?
items.answer: Enterprise plans include full white-label options with custom domains and branding.

items.question: How do QR and NFC work?
items.answer: We provide QR codes and NFC tags that link directly to your assistant. Perfect for show homes and marketing materials.

architecture.title: How OpenHouse AI Works Behind the Scenes
architecture.subtitle: A modern AI platform connecting residents, developers, and property managers

enterpriseCta.title: Need custom requirements, migrations, or multi-region deployments?

footerCta.title: Ready to modernise the resident experience across your developments?
footerCta.subtitle: Book a demo and see how OpenHouse AI transforms handover, support, and homeowner satisfaction.

items.question: How do residents access OpenHouse AI?
items.answer: Residents can access OpenHouse AI by scanning an NFC tag or QR code provided during handover. They can also access it directly via a custom URL on any device.

items.question: How is data stored?
items.answer: All data is stored in secure, GDPR-compliant data centres in the EU. We use encryption at rest and in transit, with scheme-level sandboxing for complete data isolation.

items.question: Do you support white-labelling?
items.answer: Yes, our Enterprise plan includes full white-label options with custom domains, branding, and complete UI customisation.

items.question: How quickly can we onboard a new scheme?
items.answer: Most schemes are onboarded within 48 hours. Simply upload your documents, configure your branding, and deploy NFC/QR codes.

items.question: Do we need to train the AI ourselves?
items.answer: No. Our RAG engine automatically ingests your documentation and builds a knowledge base. You can refine responses through the dashboard, but no manual AI training is required.

items.question: What languages do you support?
items.answer: OpenHouse AI supports 50+ languages out of the box, with automatic translation for international buyers and multilingual residents.
